鷇字的基本解释

鷇
kòu
须母鸟哺食的雏鸟：“声謷謷者，鸟哺鷇也。”

鷇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kòu］
［《廣韻》苦候切，上候，溪。］
亦作“1”。
(1)由母哺食的幼鸟。
(2)指鸡雏。

鷇字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷇； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1498第07
【廣韻】苦?切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丘?切，?音?。【揚子·方言】爵子及雞雛，皆謂之鷇。【爾雅·釋鳥】生哺鷇，生噣雛。【疏】鳥子生，須母哺而食之，名鷇，謂燕雀之屬也。鳥生子而能自哺食者名雛，謂雞雉之屬。【魯語】里革曰：獸長麛夭，鳥翼鷇卵。【韋註】生哺曰鷇，未乳曰卵。【莊子·齊物論】其以爲異於鷇音。【揚雄·蜀都賦】風胎雨鷇。【後漢·王符傳】世非胥庭，人乖鷇飮。【註】鷇飮不假物，淳樸時也。又【集韻】居?切，音冓。又墟?切，音彀。又古慕切，音顧。義?同。又【集韻】【韻會】克角切【正韻】乞約切，?音㱿。鳥子欲出者。【說文】从鳥在㱿中，會意。

鷇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷇字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Nian
kòu
The chicks that the mother bird feeds on: "Those who scream and squabble, the bird feeds the scorpion."
Nian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kòu］
["Guangyun" waits hard to cut, waits, and streams. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) The young bird fed by the mother.
(2) Refers to chicks.
Nian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷇; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1498 Page 07
[Guang Yun] Bitter? Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Qiu? Cut, "Yin?". 【Yangtze Dialect】Jezi and Chicks are all called 鷇. 【Erya·Shiniao】Feeds nuns and gives birth to chicks. 【Sparse】Birds are born and must be fed by their mothers. The name is scorpion, which is the genus of Chaffinch. The name of a young bird that can feed on itself by giving birth to a child is a genus of chicken pheasants. [Lu Yu] Li Ge said: The beast grows up, and the bird's wings are eggs. [Wei's Note] The birth and feeding are referred to as Nian, and the non-milking is referred to as the egg. 【Zhuangzi·Qiwu Theory】It thinks it is different from the sound. 【Yang Xiong·Shu Du Fu】Wind and rainy.
